channel.title: Work Hard on Kika
channel.description: Recent content in Work Hard on Kika

item.title: Work
item.description: During my internship I helped my teacher, a chief doctor of nutritional department, organize two times of propaganda and education– one is fouced on growing up for children, and another is focued on chronic obstructive pulmonary disease(COPD) for medical staff of the hospital, including writing activities summary reports. You can read them – “Keep Growing Up” and " Nutriotional Prevention and Treatment of COPD".

item.title: CURRICULUM VITAE
item.description: EDUCATION BACKGROUND Macau University of Science and Technology(MUST) — 09/2019-08/2023 Bachelor’s Degree in Food and Nutritional Sciences AWARDS on the “Dean’s Honor List” of Faculty of Medicine of the academic year 2020/2021 INTERNSHIP EXPERIENCE 1. Yancheng NO.1 Peeple’s Hospital — Inter of the Nutrition Department, 07/2022 - 08/2022 Followed the Director of the Nutrition Department in outpatient service consultation and expert consultation, sorted out the nutritional needs of inpatients and drew the nutritional spectrum for them.
